answers.answer: Irritation, perhaps eczema, possibly fungus in groin.  Try an over-the-counter antifungal cream like clotrimazole 1% while you arrange to see a doctor in person, which is the only way you're going to be sure of what you have or whether you have anything.Best.Dr. Rockoff

question: rash not showing  butit seems the last two weeks that when i get out of the showerand dry off i get real dry iritation on groin folds and anushave been also having constant hunger for three weeks i have family history of diabetes my father was type II,scrotum seems a little red thought laundry detergent ,Soap   not sure ?THank you
title: losing mind
